modName: Brokefoots UNP Mashup for UNP Top Model body with TBBP
summary: This is a conversion of Brokefoots UNP Mashup Compilation to the UNP Top Model body with TBBP animations.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/52015-1-1394591726.jpg[/img]
[center][color=#FF99FF][size=35]For UNP Top Model[/size][/color][/center]
[center][color=#FF99FF][size=25]TBBP[/size][/color][/center]
[center][color=#FF99FF][size=20]Weight Slider Support[/size][/color][/center]


[color=#FF99FF]=========================================================================================== [/color]

[center][color=#FFCC00][size=42]Hello and welcome![/size][/color][/center]

[color=#CC33CC]It is with great honor and humility I bring to you the Holy Grail of armor sets, the UNP Mashup Compilation by Brokefoot for the UNP Top Model body by es2. This has long been my favorite armor mod on the Nexus and a must have for all my characters. I really hope you all enjoy it. [/color]

[center][color=#FFFF33][size=35]Please note:[/size][/color][/center]

[color=#CC33CC]I spent a great deal of time converting these pieces to this wonderful body replacer and even more time chasing down and fixing clipping issues and bugs. That being said I'm aware that there is likely to be more of these issues after release as all sorts of people with all sorts of idles and animations start to use it (especially given the nature of breast physics in Skyrim). So please report these issues to me in the comments section if they are large issues but expect that some minor clipping here and there will occur. Regardless I will do what I can to support people who have issues because this is a top notch armor mod that Brokefoot put together and I want to give my best effort to make it great!
That being said, however, in order to keep the bikini meshes as close to the body as possible without clipping, parts of the body beneath the bikini cups are hidden. To keep from being able to see the missing textures beneath the edges of the bikini are kept close to the body. This will cause some clipping during certain breast animations. I know for certain that the twirling idle animation has some clipping at the edges of the bikini's because the breasts move in all sorts of crazy directions during that idle.[/color]

[color=#FF6666]Also: The Khantu shirt in the main file is not weighted to the breast bone and the bust size was increased to accommodate all the bouncing going on inside of it. There is an optional file with an alternate model for the shirt that fits tighter and is also weighted directly to the breasts so it moves with them...your choice.[/color] :)

[color=#CC33CC]============================================================================================
[/color]
[color=#FF0000][u][size=50]Requirements![/size][/u][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41051/?]UNP Top Model Body[/url] by es2
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Skeleton[/url] by XP32
(or another TBBP compatible skeleton)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34713/?]The TBBP animation of Dragonfly[/url] by Lecid
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20415/?]Brokefoots UNP Mashup Compilation[/url] by Brokefoot

[center][color=#FF0000][u]Without a TBBP Compatible Skeleton you will Crash to Desktop!!!!![/u][/color][/center]

[color=#CC33CC]============================================================================================
[/color]
[color=#FF6600][size=15]Recommended [/size][/color]

Mods I use
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7093/?]No Maam Breathing Idles[/url] by Fore
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34508/?]360 Walk and Run Plus[/url] by yukl
[color=#FF6666]Use these for minimal clipping[/color]

Also other Armors I've done for Top Model
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52221/?]Ancient Nord Armor[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51607/?]Prisoner Clothes[/url]
[color=#CC33CC]============================================================================================
[/color]
[size=30][color=#FFCC66]To Install[/color][/size]
Once you have the correct body and skeleton installed download and install Brokefoots original mod (Link above) and then install this mod and overwrite.
If you wish to manually install drop Brokefoots Data file into your skyrim Data folder followed by mine and overwrite when asked.
If you wish to install a patch that affects these armors stats etc install them last.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24346/?]Heavy Armor Version[/url] by trumbitta
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34983/?]Clothing Versions[/url] by psiroflcopter

[color=#CC33CC]============================================================================================
[/color]
[color=#FFFF00][size=30]Credits for this conversion[/size][/color]

First and Foremost I want to thank Bethesda for making this fantastic game and allowing scrubs like me to modify it.
Also thanks to the Nexus and the staff. You guys make this all possible and easy to do.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/537675/?]dimon99[/url] for the UNP model that all of these awesome variants are based from. Epic win!
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7479893/?]es2[/url] for the beautiful Top Model body
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3575696/?]Brokefoot[/url] for the original UNP Mashup and for giving me permission to do this. It was truly a labor of love.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/183089/?]XP32[/url] for the skeleton that allows all the wonderful modders to do magnificent things with their body models.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4314722/?]LeCid[/url] for all of the glorious bounce!
Blender and Nifskope my weapons of choice!

[color=#CC33CC]============================================================================================[/color]

[color=#66FFFF][size=30]Known Issues[/size][/color]
There is still some minor clipping particularly with the hand/upper arm and leg / foot pieces. In particular the Sock pieces clip around the foot but you don't see it at all with shoes / boots on.

I have not checked all various combinations across the various sets to make sure there is not clipping...I don't even know if that's possible. Nor have I checked every idle / animation to check for clipping. I know that breast clipping occurs when using the "twirl" idle.

I'm terrible at hand painting for weight and blender is not very good at painting skirts either but i did my best with the Dandelion Skirt I think it worked out well but it clips at the stomach when sneaking.

Thanks for reading this far maybe you should have a stretch :P

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/52015-1-1394624315.jpg[/img]
